V

validate(Client) - Method in class com.muri.business.validators.ClientValidator
This implemented version of validate(Object) checks the name and email field to be of specific format.
validate(Order) - Method in class com.muri.business.validators.OrderValidator
This implemented version of validate(Object) checks the following things: If the client with the client_id exists If the product with the product_id exists If there are enough products in the stock
validate(Product) - Method in class com.muri.business.validators.ProductValidator
This implemented version of validate(Object) checks if the price and stock are greater than 0.
validate(T) - Method in interface com.muri.business.validators.Validator
Takes in an object, checks its appropriate fields
Validator<T> - Interface in com.muri.business.validators
An interface meant for implementing by the three type of validators: ClientValidator, OrderValidator, and ProductValidator.
